RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: select lang_code,lang_name from smtb_language where record_stat = 'O' and once_auth = 'Y' order by lang_code
select ccy_code, ccy_name from cytms_ccy_defn where auth_stat = 'A' and record_stat = 'O'
